data.name: Entity Researchers: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
Like the free prologue? Buy the full game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1562230/Entity_Researchers/


About the Game

We are the Entity Investigation & Research Institute.

You just got hired by EIRI; researching and battling the Visitors, unknown entities that have invaded our world. A dark sci-fi dungeon crawling RPG with themes of exploration and survival.


Play to level 10 in the Entity Researchers: Prologue, saves carry over to the full game.

Gameplay:

  • Battle: Destroy entities to gain XP, currency and items.
  • Explore: Investigate procedurally generated maps for entities and items.
  • Research: Discover more about the entities.
  • Refine: Craft/purchase/discover new items to improve your loadout.
  • Advance: Defeat bosses to receive high rarity rewards.

Features:

  • Hybrid real-time/turn-based battles.
  • Randomized maps.
  • 90 basic entities and 60 bosses.
  • 10 secret entities.
  • Randomized Unique items and 180+ standard items.
  • 20+ moves with unique Critical bonuses.
  • Hardcore mode.

data.short_description: You just got hired by EIRI; researching and battling the Visitors, a dark sci-fi RPG with themes of exploration and survival.
data.reviews:
“A wild isometric RPG featuring a load of strange visuals and in-depth combat options.”
Dread XP

“Feels like a game that has teleported into the future from the ’90s.”
That VideoGame Blog

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: AMD Athlon or Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 965 or Intel Core i5-3470 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB video card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14+
  • Processor: AMD Athlon or Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB video card
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14+
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 965 or Intel Core i5-3470 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB video card
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
